body: Some gnomes have strong ties to specific kinds of terrain, as a holdover from their fey origins. These gnomes gain a +2 dodge bonus to AC when in a specific terrain type selected from the ranger list of favored terrains. This choice is made at character creation, and cannot be changed. This racial trait replaces defensive training and hatred.
name: Bond to the Land
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Gnomes/Alternate Racial Rules/Alternate Racial Traits/Bond to the Land
